name: Push Up
description: A calisthenics exercise pushing the body up from the floor, primarily targeting the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Barbell Squat
description: A compound movement involving squatting down with a barbell on the upper back, targeting the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Pull Up
description: An upper-body exercise involving pulling the body up using an overhand grip, primarily targeting the latissimus dorsi and biceps.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: An upper-body exercise pressing a barbell upward while lying on a bench, targeting the pectorals, anterior deltoids, and triceps.

name: Conventional Deadlift
description: A compound lift involving lifting a barbell from the ground to a standing position, targeting the posterior chain (glutes, hamstrings, back).

name: Overhead Press
description: A shoulder exercise pressing a weight overhead, primarily targeting the deltoids and triceps.

name: Bent-Over Row
description: A back exercise pulling a weight towards the torso while hinged at the hips, targeting the lats, rhomboids, and traps.

name: Dumbbell Lunge
description: A unilateral leg exercise stepping forward and lowering the hips, targeting the quads and glutes.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
description: An isolation exercise bending the elbow to lift a weight, targeting the biceps brachii and brachialis.

name: Tricep Pushdown
description: An isolation exercise straightening the elbow against resistance, targeting the triceps.

name: Plank
description: An isometric core exercise holding a rigid, straight line from head to heels, targeting the entire abdominal wall.

name: Leg Press
description: A machine-based exercise pushing a weight away with the legs, targeting the quadriceps, glutes, and hamstrings.

name: Lateral Raise
description: An isolation exercise lifting weights out to the sides, targeting the lateral deltoids.

name: Standing Calf Raise
description: An exercise rising up onto the toes to work the calf muscles, primarily the gastrocnemius.

name: Romanian Deadlift
description: A hinge movement targeting the posterior chain, emphasizing the hamstrings and glutes with a stiff-legged motion.

name: Lat Pulldown
description: A machine exercise involving pulling a wide bar down, simulating a pull-up to target the latissimus dorsi.

name: Seated Cable Row
description: A horizontal pulling exercise using a cable machine, targeting the mid-back muscles like rhomboids, traps, and lats.

name: Dips
description: An upper-body calisthenics exercise lowering the body between parallel bars, targeting the triceps and chest.

name: Leg Extension
description: An isolation machine exercise straightening the knee against resistance, targeting the quadriceps.

name: Leg Curl
description: An isolation machine exercise bending the knee against resistance, targeting the hamstrings.

name: Incline Barbell Press
description: A bench press variation on an incline, emphasizing the upper (clavicular) head of the pectorals.

name: Chin Up
description: An upper-body exercise pulling the body up using a supinated (underhand) grip, emphasizing the biceps and lats.

name: Cable Crossover
description: A chest isolation exercise bringing cable handles together, targeting the sternal (mid/lower) head of the pectorals.

name: Dumbbell Flye
description: A chest isolation exercise opening and closing the arms with dumbbells, emphasizing chest adduction.

name: Hip Thrust
description: A glute exercise involving thrusting the hips up against resistance, primarily targeting the gluteus maximus.

name: Front Squat
description: A squat variation with the barbell held on the front of the shoulders, emphasizing the quadriceps and upper back.

name: Seated Dumbbell Press
description: A seated shoulder press with dumbbells, targeting all three heads of the deltoid, especially the anterior.

name: Barbell Shrug
description: An isolation exercise lifting the shoulders (elevation) with a barbell, targeting the upper trapezius.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
description: A core exercise lifting the legs while hanging from a bar, targeting the lower rectus abdominis and hip flexors.

name: Crunch
description: A classic abdominal exercise involving flexing the spine, targeting the rectus abdominis.

name: Kettlebell Swing
description: An explosive hip-hinge movement, targeting the glutes, hamstrings, and erector spinae.

name: Russian Twist
description: A core exercise involving twisting the torso side-to-side, targeting the obliques.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: A dynamic, full-body exercise that mimics running in a plank position, targeting the core, shoulders, and quads.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body calisthenic movement combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
description: A bench press variation with a narrow grip, placing more emphasis on the triceps.

name: Skullcrusher (Lying Tricep Extension)
description: An isolation exercise lying down and extending the elbows, targeting the long head of the triceps.

name: Preacher Curl
description: An isolation curl with the upper arm supported, focusing on the brachialis and biceps short head.

name: Dumbbell Front Raise
description: An isolation exercise lifting dumbbells straight forward, targeting the anterior deltoid.

name: Face Pull
description: A cable exercise pulling a rope towards the face, targeting the posterior deltoids and upper back.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
description: An exercise lying on a bench and moving a dumbbell in an arc over the head, stretching the lats and serratus.

name: Seated Calf Raise
description: A calf exercise with bent knees, isolating the soleus muscle.

name: Side Lunge
description: A lunge variation stepping to the side, targeting the adductors (inner thigh) and gluteus medius.

name: Decline Bench Press
description: A bench press variation on a decline, emphasizing the lower (sternal) head of the pectorals.

name: Renegade Row
description: A plank variation involving rowing a dumbbell one arm at a time, challenging core stability and the back.

name: Box Jump
description: A plyometric exercise involving jumping onto an elevated platform, building explosive power.

name: Barbell Curl
description: A classic biceps isolation exercise using a barbell and an underhand grip.

name: Good Morning
description: A hip-hinge exercise with a barbell on the back, targeting the erector spinae and hamstrings.

name: Straight Arm Pulldown
description: A cable isolation exercise for the lats, keeping the arms straight throughout the movement.

name: Wrist Curl
description: An isolation exercise flexing the wrist against resistance, targeting the forearm flexors.

name: Reverse Wrist Curl
description: An isolation exercise extending the wrist against resistance, targeting the forearm extensors.

name: Hammer Curl
description: A biceps curl variation with a neutral grip, emphasizing the brachialis and brachioradialis.
